title: Atomic Habits
author: James Clear
description: A practical guide on building small habits that lead to remarkable long-term improvements in life.

title: The Alchemist
author: Paulo Coelho
description: A story about following your dreams and listening to your heart through the journey of a young shepherd named Santiago.

title: Deep Work
author: Cal Newport
description: A guide to achieving focused success in a distracted world by cultivating deep work habits.

title: Sapiens
author: Yuval Noah Harari
description: A brief history of humankind exploring how humans evolved and shaped the modern world.

title: Educated
author: Tara Westover
description: A memoir about a woman who grows up isolated from society and pursues education despite resistance.

title: The Subtle Art
author: Mark Manson
description: A counterintuitive guide to living a better life by caring less about things that don't matter.

author: George Orwell
description: A dystopian novel about government surveillance, control, and loss of individuality.

title: The Lean Startup
author: Eric Ries
description: A revolutionary approach to business creation focused on validated learning and rapid experimentation.

title: The Power of Now
author: Eckhart Tolle
description: A spiritual guide on living in the present moment and letting go of past and future worries.

title: Clean Code
author: Robert C. Martin
description: A handbook of agile software craftsmanship, emphasizing clean, maintainable code practices.

title: The Programmer
author: Andrew Hunt & David Thomas
description: A classic programming book covering practical techniques for becoming a better software developer.

title: Thinking, Fast and Slow
author: Daniel Kahneman
description: An exploration of the psychological systems that drive human thinking â€” fast intuitive thinking and slow rational thinking.
